name: Chronon
description: Chronon is a puzzle game in the first person.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 32-bit Processor: Dual-core 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU with 512MB VRAM (nVidia GeForce 8600 series, AMD Radeon HD 3600 series, Intel HD 4000 series) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX9.0c Compatible Sound Card
